id.description: A sharp-featured scholar with a dark triangular beard.

aspects.aspect: If I Haven't Been There, I've Read About It

extras.extra: Allows the use of Scholar for loosely-defined magical actions.

stunts.stunt: Can make Physical Recovery attempts w/Scholar

Once per scene you can spend a fate point (and a few minutes of observation) to make a special Scholar roll representing your potent deductive faculties. For each shift you make on this roll you discover or create an aspect, on either the scene or the target of your observations, though you may only invoke one of them for free.

You’ve read hundreds—if not thousands—of books on a wide variety of topics. You can spend a fate point to use Scholar in place of any other skill for one roll or exchange, provided you can justify having read about the action you’re attempting.
